name: @halospv3/hce.shared
description: Automate commit messages quality, changelog generation, and CI/CD releases. Exports a semantic-release deserialized from this package's '.releaserc.yml'. Shared resources for .NET projects are also distributed with this package.
author: BinToss
// jest: If the configurations for Jest, TS-Jest, or VSCode-Jest are changed, tests may fail if an active test runner fails to update its configuration and then defaults to the incompatible default configuration. If this occurs, try restarting the test runner before troubleshooting anything else. In VSCode, open the Testing pane, right-click the test suite, and select 'Update Snapshot'. I don't know why that works.
// semantic-release: After HCE.Shared's Shareable Configuration (see 'node/static/releaserc.yml', https://semantic-release.gitbook.io/semantic-release/usage/configuration#extends) is loaded, the following semantic-release configuration is merged into the configuration object, overriding existing values. Later, when a release is triggered, semantic-release will add any unspecified settings with default values.
// semantic-release - How to review the: `npx semantic-release --dry-run --debug`. This will run semantic-release with 'dry-run' (no committing changes, tags, publishing activity, and more) and 'debug' (output verbose info, including the actual config object).
// semantic-release - WARNING!: Arrays and child objects are overwritten entirely. When 'plugins' is set, only commit-analyzer is added if missing.
// semantic-release - plugins configurat: Plugins are configured via tuple-like arrays e.g. ['plugin name', {config object}].
